name: Saving Grace
description:
What would it be like if some masked men took your daughter? What would you do?
How would you do it? Would you meet their demands... Or suffer the loss. The choice is yours.
Undertake this journey to get your daughter back... If it's not already too late.

Alternatively, if you have completed the campaign. Why not delve into the Saving Grace "Hack and Slash" mode,
where you will kill unrelentless waves of demons, while simultaniously upgrading your gear to keep you alive!

While you embark on this mysterious journey you will encounter various obsticals and mysteries you must solve.
-Solve puzzles
-Defeat the enemies by out manuevering and out gunning them with various weapons.
- Use your wits and and explore a dark mysterious town to solve puzzles as cultists try to stop you from learning the truth.
-Use stealth to avoid enemies to get the upper hand.
-Uncover the dark truth to why your daughter was chosen
-Face off against the devil himself in an epic boss battle!
